# init(bundleIdentifier:)

**Initializer**

Creates an object that represents the app with the specified bundle identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
init(bundleIdentifier: String)
```

## Parameters

- **bundleIdentifier**: The appâ€™s bundle identifier.

## Creating an Application

- **init(token:)**: Creates an object that represents the app with the specified token.
